thread.title: Outback celebrates Harvick Sprint Cup win with free Bloomin' Onion on Oct. 26.
thread.title_full: Outback celebrates Harvick Sprint Cup win with free Bloomin' Onion on Oct. 26. - Sun Sentinel

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Outback celebrates Harvick Sprint Cup win with free Bloomin' Onion on Oct. 26.
text:
Get a free Bloomin' Onion at Outback Steakhouse on Monday, Oct. 26.
NASCAR racer Kevin Harvick 15th at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama on Sunday, so you get free eats at Outback.
No coupon is necessary. Just say "Bloomin' Monday" to your server to get the freebie with any purchase.
Outback gives away the free appetizers when Harvick places in the top 10 of a Sprint Cup on Monday following a race. I have no idea why Outback is giving away the freebies today, since Harvick placed 15th , and is being blamed by some drivers for causing a wreck.
Click here for the deal.
